page.title: 01OLD PEOPLES HOME
page.content: One wednesday afternoon we went down to the home. We went to see what the old people would say about Selkirk in the olden days .We spoke to the matron Miss Cookman and she show'd us around the home. After that we went to see the old people and we asked them questions. They have meals at 12.30 for lunch,5.00 for tea and 8.00 for supper,and all the old people liked the staff. They found it easy to have a bath in the home than at their house. Most of them lived in selkirk all their life,most of the old people went to knowepark and the argus as the high school,then they all have enough to eat. The home serves Selkirk and the surounding area and although not within our area some of the people in the home come from our area .
